thread.title: Aerial shots show extent of Hawke's Bay fire
thread.title_full: Aerial shots show extent of Hawke's Bay fire

title: Aerial shots show extent of Hawke's Bay fire
text:
Aerial shots show extent of Hawke's Bay fire Last updated 12:48, February 18 2017 PETER SCOTT/SUPPLIED 
Hawke's Bay aerial photographer Peter Scott captured the extent of the wildfire's damage. 
Aerial photos show the Hastings land scorched by wildfires. 
The fire ripped through the tinder-dry land near Waimarama in the Hastings District earlier this week. 
Local aerial photographer Peter Scott captured some dramatic images that clearly show the extent of the damage on the land. PETER SCOTT/SUPPLIED 
Firefighters from across the country travelled to Hawke's Bay to help battle the blaze. 
The district's state of emergency status was lifted on Wednesday, after being declared on Monday.
